content.en: Networked Control Systems: Researchers are using algorithms to address various challenges in networked control systems. These algorithms are designed to stabilize the systems, achieve desired disturbance-rejection-attenuation levels, and ensure robust stability and prescribed disturbance attenuation performance. They take into account factors such as random packet losses, random time delays, network-induced delays, and packet dropouts. The goal is to improve the stability and performance of these systems in the presence of uncertainties and communication constraints.
content.da: Netværksstyrede systemer: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at tackle forskellige udfordringer i netværksstyrede systemer. Disse algoritmer er designet til at stabilisere systemerne, opnå ønskede niveauer af støjafvisning-attenuering og sikre robust stabilitet og foreskrevet støjattenueringsydelse. De tager højde for faktorer såsom tilfældige pakkeforsinkelser, tilfældige tidsforsinkelser, netværksinducerede forsinkelser og pakkefrafald. Målet er at forbedre stabiliteten og ydeevnen af disse systemer i nærvær af usikkerheder og kommunikationsbegrænsninger.
